articles.author: Cleve R. Wootson Jr.
articles.title: Harris, in Ghana, promises Africa support, but must overcome skeptics - The Washington Post
articles.description: Vice President Harris announced nearly $139 million in funding to Ghana, her first stop on a weeklong tour of Africa.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
ACCRA, Ghana Vice President Harris began a week-long tour of Africa on Monday by announcing the United States plans to invest hundreds of millions of dollars in the continent, … [+8343 chars]
